items.title: No more veggie burgers? EU parliament votes to ban meat names for plant-based foods
items.description: Pressure to ban meat labels for plant-based products comes from Europe's livestock farmers.

items.title: Social media content restricted in Afghanistan, Taliban sources confirm
items.description: It comes just over a week after a two-day total internet shutdown across the country ended.

items.title: Four dead after six-storey building partially collapses in Madrid
items.description: An architect and three workers were among those who died at the building which was being renovated.
